short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BBC Sport News Notifications in your Chrome. This Sport News Notifier follows the BBC sport news and informs you in real time

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Follow all BBC Sport news without even visiting the BBC website. Our Sport News Notifier tracks BBC sport news non-stop and sends you a notification to your Chrome browser when news come up.

Add this Sport News Notifier to your Chrome and it will do the rest. Sta focused on your work or leisure and we will take care of the news. 

No more constant BBC website check for sport news, no more missed games, scores results or events. Trust your sport news to our BBC Sport News Notifier and enjoy your life, we'll let you know as soon as something new appears on BBC Sport section.

Follow your dream, not the news!
